context: By 2024, Tenable served 43,000 organizations including 60% of Fortune 500. Competitive landscape highly diverse with traditional VM competitors, major cybersecurity platforms, cloud-native specialists, endpoint security vendors, and AI-powered solutions. Nessus remains industry standard despite increased competition.
